name: Arcade Homage
description:
Gamejam Game for Blackthornprod's "Less is More" jam.

In this game you experience some gameplay of old, when they had to do with less :) just play around and find all the "secrets" (it ends when 'arcade homage' drops down).

Unfortunately I did not have nearly as much time to work on this as expected. The original idea was for the different games to interact as you clear up the menu screen.

Made with Godot, LMMS, Aseprite, beepbox.co and sfxr.me
